statements: DELETE FROM vehicle_eta WHERE current_location = 'Warehouse' AND destination_location = 'Office';
DELETE FROM vehicle_eta WHERE vehicle_id = 123 AND estimated_time_of_arrival < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM vehicle_eta WHERE destination_location = 'Warehouse' AND current_location = 'Garage';
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE current_location = 'New York' AND route_data ->> 'city' = 'Chicago';
DELETE FROM arrival_estimations WHERE route_id = 2 AND vehicle_id = 3;
DELETE FROM arrival_estimations WHERE route_id = 5 AND vehicle_id = 3;
DELETE FROM estimated_arrival_times WHERE vehicle_id = 200 AND route_id = 10;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE route_id IN (SELECT route_id FROM routes WHERE start_location='New York') AND vehicle_id NOT IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM estimated_arrival_times);
